title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 16 ยง 232.4 - Contents
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 16 ยง 232.4 - Contents

State Regulations

Such report shall be made on a form 81/2 x 11 inches, arranged in accordance with the form as set out in Appendix 3-A of this section
and shall give the following information: the district in which interruption
occurred; the week for which report is rendered; the date or dates on which
interruptions occurred; the time the company received notification of the
interruption; the time the company dispatched its personnel to the scene of the
interruption and their arrival time; the times when interruptions began and
ended; the duration in hours and minutes of such interruptions; the section of
the territory served by the corporation or the municipality affected by such
interruption and the approximate number of consumers affected thereby; and the
cause or causes of the interruption in reasonable detail. Such report must be
signed by a duly authorized officer, or his designee, of such corporation or
municipality. Image

Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 16
ยง
232.4

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
